name: Sonnette Simmons
text: Very nice place friendly environment

name: Big Bill
text: Truck entrance at Burgin Ave. less than half mile down the street, once you get to the entrance the receiving is straight BUT you got to do a WIDE 180 TRUN to back in across the entrance gate.

name: Tim Jones
text: Not a good place to work. The team leader Denise is the most low down, diabolical woman I’ve ever seen. She will try to bully you to get a negative reaction to get you fired. If that doesn’t work, she will lie to the supervisor.

name: Briana Conderivera
text: good care and loaded quickly.

name: Vasco Network
text: No space for 18 wheelers!! DO NOT PULL IN TO GET ON LOAD DOCK

name: Ken Snow
text: Great place

name: Melissa Thomas
text: Not big truck friendly! Do not turn into drive, go about 1/4 of a mile down and turn left on the next street you see... Don't have a name that I can see. Does have overnight curb parking for a couple of trucks. Only one dock so must wait outside gate until truck ahead of you is finished. Nasty, tight blind back into dock so make an immediate left after entering gate. It just blows my mind when places like this order 45,000lbs worth of product but can't accommodate a big rig.

name: RaJohn Edwards
text: Great atmosphere!  Family oriented!

text: Very nice place friendly environment

name: RaJohn Edwards
text: Great atmosphere!  Family oriented!

name: Brittany Brooks
text: GREAT EXPERIENCE. I contacted the team to request a quote for Baby Shower invites. They were very nice and helpful. They had the invites printed and ready to go two days after I had first contacted them. They turned out GREAT. I will definitely be using them again in the future.

resp.text: Thank you Brittany for trusting us with your printing needs!

name: Juana M
text: Outstanding service! They went above and beyond to get our flyers printed for a Conference in Hunstville on very short notice. We needed last minute prints because our marketing literature was lost in the mail when shipping from Houston. We are very grateful for them! Thank you!

resp.text: We're so glad you contacted us and that it worked out for you!

name: Lloyd Thompson
text: I can't say enough good things about these folks. They are more than prompt, super friendly, very helpful, reasonably priced, centrally located, and just plain cool. Everyone who works there has a nice attitude and they obviously care about the quality of the work and the needs of their customers. I wish I could leave 10 stars.

resp.text: Thank you very much for trusting us with your printing Lloyd!

name: Emily Key
text:
Phenomenal service. Minuteman is always so helpful to me when I am doing odd projects and need to figure out the best way to do it. Even when the job might seem unimportant or small.

I received incredible support from them today after I wanted small precise card sized stickers done of my art and they did everything they could to help me figure it all out, even helped me budget and cut my own costs with the needless things.

I never feel deceived or oversold on anything and the work always comes out high quality. I love this company and the people here, they really do care about their work. Aways my preferred choice for printing!!

resp.text: Thank you for making us your goto for printing needs Emily, I'm so glad we could partner with you!

name: Amy McWilliams
text:
The team at Minuteman Press is wonderful! Highly quality products coupled with great staff makes Minuteman Press our go to printer.

Jonathan's team has assisted us with hundreds of projects for our company and our clients. We keep going back for competitive pricing, knowledgeable and responsive staff, and quick turnarounds.

resp.text: Thank you Amy!  It's always fun working with y'all!

name: Joseph Conwell
text: Jonathan and his team are great at what they do!  Whether it is a small print job for stationary or a large commercial print job or vehicle wrap they are the best!  Theater handle all of my printing needs with quality and care!

resp.text: Thank you Joseph!  We really appreciate the relationship we've been able to build with you and your team!

name: emily long
text: upon visiting the shop i witnessed some unprofessional mannerism from the owners from the beginning. It should have been a red flag that i should have not ignored. The owner and his wife were arguing. Which i later found out was a constant occurrence. He even went to tell me personal things about his wife that no man should say about his wife.  The owner Johnathan was very unprofessional and exuded the attitude that he was above everyone else. The signs i purchased were of poor quality and not the correct size. I later called to complain and Johnathan was very rude. Did not care to hear a customers concerns. And talked to me like i was scum on the bottom of his shoes. I would not recommend this place at all the owners are unprofessional and the quality of their products is not good either.

name: Kimberly Hardee
text: Jonathan and his team go above and beyond to produce quality products with great customer service! I use them for all of my printing needs!

resp.text: Thank you!  We really appreciate your business!

name: Julie M
text: We have used Minute Man for all of our school copying needs. Jonathan is wonderful to work with. He's very efficient and helpful. Every employee I have encountered there has been totally professional and very nice. It's always a joy to go in there. Plus, being able to utilize the website to upload documents for printing is so convenient. Everyone around me who has been in Minute Man comments on how nice everyone is. Copying is quick and great quality every time!

name: Kristen Bowen
text:
We had a great experience with Minuteman Press! I recently became the Marketing and Advertising Manager of a local company. Almost immediately, I began searching for a new printing company to build a relationship with. I met with Johnathan and reviewed their pricing, 1/2 of the prices we were getting from other companies. That was not the best part though, Laura, completely revamped our large brochure. It looks incredible! They were cheaper, did a better layout, much friendlier and cheaper than anywhere else we looked!
They make us look great! So happy we switched!

name: Lauren Jones
text: I cannot speak highly enough or recommend them enough! From save-the-dates, to rehearsal invites, to the whole wedding suite invites and menus and programs etc etc etc -- they went above and beyond to make everything look perfect AND IT IS SO AFFORDABLE! They have the nicest, most accommodating customer service and the highest quality work from the graphic design to printing to mail merging for envelopes. Save your headaches and money and use them.

name: Carolyn Dietrich
text: I own a real estate company and a property management company in Madison.  We have been using Minuteman Press for business cards, magnets, signs, etc. for years.  We use them because of the great relationship we have with Dawn McDonnell.  She is professional, knows her products, has timely delivery and is incredibly nice!  I never inquire about price, because to me, it doesn't matter.  I get quality products with excellent customer service, and that is most important to me.  She also did a great job on our wedding service programs!  We highly recommend Dawn McDonnell and the staff at Minuteman Press!

name: Minuteman Press-Franklin
text: Outstanding team! Jonathan has been tremendously helpful to our company and I highly recommend them for any printing / marketing design project you may have.

name: Bippen Electric, Inc
text: Just had Minuteman design, print and install a full vehicle wrap on one of our company vehicles. It turned out great! Our logo and text are reflective. So at night they glow when headlights hit them. Looking forward to having another one done soon. Can't say enough about the staff at Minuteman. Thank you! 👍🏼

name: David Rice
text:
Always prompt, professional, and the best customer service you could ever ask for.
I’ve been a customer for 4 years now and I am always pleased at how well the Huntsville team always handles my orders, regardless of how much or how little time I give them.  They routinely produce my orders and have them shipped to the locations of my choice, and always on time and perfectly completed.
A huge thank you for always helping me look good and professional.

name: Shannon Harwell
text: Minuteman Press has printed our company materials for the past few years.  They came highly recommended by someone else in the printing business and have created professional material for us in a timely manner.  I recommend them to anyone who needs something professionally printed.

name: Erin Bloxhamcurtis
text: I LOVE working with the team at Minuteman Press. All of our items are printed in a professional and timely manner. From graphics to delivery - they do it all!

name: Joshua McAlister
text: Minuteman Press is great. They always complete orders in a timely and quality fashion. I've used them for quite a few things and have always been happy. Highly recommend!

name: A G
text:
Minuteman always does an above and beyond job with all of their printing jobs. Anything from one-off projects to thousands of items, Jonathan and the whole staff always make sure to end product is professional, clean, and cost-efficient. Even for (admittedly) last-minute jobs, I know I don't have to worry after I hand my artwork off to Minuteman--they'll get the job done! :)

I will recommend them to anyone!!

name: Allison McReynolds
text: I have used Minuteman Press for many professional designs and prints as well as personal prints for my wedding. I appreciate their timeliness with communicating to their customers and the care they take with their work. They definitely make it easy to keep coming back!

name: Alan Helms
text: They are always willing to help and have a very fast turn around. They make doing business very easy with there delivery service!

name: Wesley Moffett
text: This was my first print job done via Minuteman Press, and I was very happy with both their customer service and the product they created for me. I will definitely use them again in the future!

name: Tina Parker
text: Jonathan and his stafff are helpful and easy to work with.  They provide exceptional service and always meet our demands, especially when we are in a hurry!! Thanks for all you do, the whole staff at Home Mortgage of America.

name: Josh Henry
text: This is the place to go for all your printing needs!! Dawn has a great talent for understanding what is needed to get the job done and in a timely manner. The prices are very fair in todays market. Love this place!

name: Brandon Morris
text: Very helpful and friendly staff. Gave me good options and delivered great quality product.

name: ashley dunwoody
text: The staff is awesome!  They are always so friendly and helpful when I need them!  I would highly recommend them to anyone!!

name: William Warrington
text: All jobs were on time and within budget.  All problems were resolved quickly.  Great people to work with.

name: Kallie Butler
text: Great staff, amazing customer service and all the products that we've ordered have been exactly what we've asked for. Highly recommend.

name: Josh Henry
text: This is the place to go for all your printing needs!! Dawn has a great talent for understanding what is needed to get the job done and in a timely manner. The prices are very fair in todays market. Love this place!

name: Dr. Debbie Hargett
text: Wonderful customer service and quick turnaround on their work. Would definitely recommend Minuteman Press!

name: Tina Parker
text: Jonathan and his stafff are helpful and easy to work with.  They provide exceptional service and always meet our demands, especially when we are in a hurry!! Thanks for all you do, the whole staff at Home Mortgage of America.

name: Bo Thomas
text: We use Minute Man for all of our printing needs. They always take care of us and offer many other products besides print. When I have been in a time crunch I have talked to Jonathan directly and he has always come through to get the project done on time.

name: danny newton
text:
Used their services several times. Every single time, they tell me it will be ready at a time and date. I show up after that time to pick it up, walk in, and it is NEVER READY! THIS IS EXTREMELY FRUSTRATING. No, I do not want to return later. No I do not want to sit in the lobby and wait for you to make it happen. Have it ready when you say it will be ready.

Last time I was there the manager said, "I thought I told you it would be ready tomorrow" I proceeded to read him the email he sent to me the day before saying it would be ready. He said "oh, I'll have it in 5 minutes"

I have decided to go with another printer.

name: Linex Marketing
text: Love the customer service, support and partnership that MInuteman brings to our business.

name: Stephen Rice
text: Great service, great prices!  Jonathan and his crew are the best in town

name: Timekee Turner PhD
text: Always on time. Always perfect. #excellentwork

name: Nichelle Fields
text: They are great when you have a big Company name behind you, but if you are a small business owner, the service was very slow. No follow ups I had to follow up three times plus it finally took three weeks to get my order. Johnathon is not what he is cranked up to be either.

resp.text:
Wow, I am very sorry that you had a bad experience with Minuteman Press and especially with me.  I am not aware of this situation.  Please contact me at your convenience so that I may be able to resolve the issues and hopefully provide a solution that will help.
Jonathan

name: Elizabeth Houssain
text: Minuteman Press ALWAYS provides extraordinary service at a great price.  I recommend them to all of my clients, and they are so happy with their experience at Minuteman, they come back to me and thank me for the referral!

name: chris denton
text: Great customer service and a very detail oriented staff.

name: Jeff Lyons
text: Everyone on the team is great - professional, friendly, attention to quality and detail, and always courteous and a pleasure to work with! Thank you!

name: Karla Hawkins
text: Very friendly and excellent work on our business cards. Thank you!

name: Marcus Elliott
text: I trust these guys with our printing needs. Always helpful!

name: Stephanie Cash
text: Easy to communicate with and finished product looked great!

name: Brian Bellomy
text: Great Quality and great staff!

name: Jim Algie
text: Had a short deadline to meet which was met with time to spare and all of this happening during the holidays.  Thanks.

name: Karen Sumerlin
text: Great service, top quality work, excellent product!

name: Malcolm Taylor
text: They do good work here.

name: Adrienne Matthews
text: Quick and quality products. A+++

name: Adrienne Matthews
text: Quick and quality products. A+++

name: Jay Hixon
text: Great folks and service!

name: Aaron Lutz
text: They helped me with what i need but expensive to print just 3 pages of paper!

name: Brandi Mason
text: Quick and accurate service

name: BamAlaBam
text: Professional and on-time!

name: Torrey Price
text: Friendly, fast, and reliable

name: Bryan Radcliffe
text: excellent
